title.rendered: How To Keep Your CRM and Marketing Automation Lists Clean

content.rendered:
[vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” content_placement=”bottom” css=”.vc_custom_1511522702602{border-bottom-width: 5px !important;padding-top: 80px !important;padding-bottom: 80px !important;background-image: url(https://wp.static-cdn-shsp.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/02/single-resource-page-bg-colorol-1902×496.jpg) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;border-bottom-color: #f5f5f5 !important;border-bottom-style: solid !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_col-lg-7 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-sm-offset-0 vc_col-xs-12″ css=”.vc_custom_1504895160519{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;padding-right: 10% !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_empty_space height=”90px” el_class=”sm-hide”]

How To Keep Your CRM and Marketing Automation Lists Clean

[vc_empty_space el_class=”sm-hide”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_col-lg-5 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-xs-12″][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1512064059284{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 30px !important;padding-right: 30px !important;padding-bottom: 30px !important;padding-left: 30px !important;background-color: #3a3042 !important;border-radius: 5px !important;}”]

On-Demand Webinar
Air Date: June 23, 2015
Duration: 1 hour

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row content_placement=”top” css=”.vc_custom_1514478297713{padding-top: 5% !important;padding-bottom: 5% !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_col-lg-7 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-sm-offset-0 vc_col-xs-12″ css=”.vc_custom_1504895160519{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;padding-right: 10% !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_row_inner css=”.vc_custom_1507577013722{margin-top: -24% !important;margin-bottom: 5% !important;padding-bottom: 5% !important;}” el_class=”sm-hide”][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][vc_single_image image=”159577″ add_caption=”yes” alignment=”center” style=”vc_box_border_circle_2″ css=”.vc_custom_1509671534403{margin-bottom: 0px !important;border-bottom-width: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][vc_single_image image=”159576″ add_caption=”yes” alignment=”center” style=”vc_box_border_circle_2″ css=”.vc_custom_1509671550437{margin-bottom: 0px !important;border-bottom-width: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][vc_single_image image=”159575″ add_caption=”yes” alignment=”center” style=”vc_box_border_circle_2″ css=”.vc_custom_1509671563978{margin-bottom: 0px !important;border-bottom-width: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_column_text el_class=”list-unstyled list-chevron”]

Customer relationship management is more than CRM software.

It is an expansive view that takes multiple pieces of  software technology into account, such as Salesforce or Dynamics CRM, all while using marketing automation software and customer service platforms to understand customers and prospects from lead generation through post-sale.

With a connected marketing automation and CRM systems, the database is changing constantly. Data gets old, people switch jobs and retire.

Like meat, prospect and contact data goes bad quickly. A standard process for adding new data, removing dupes, and updating incomplete records will help you improve response and sleep better at night.

You’ll learn how to:

  • Better understand your database
  • Clean and maintain data to improve targeting and campaign performance
  • Keep your database stocked with new prospect data

[/vc_column_text]

Featured Presenters:

Ben Bradley

Founder – Macon Raine

Ben Bradley is the founder Macon Raine - a B2B marketing agency - and a specialist in developing processes that improve CRM hygiene and campaign performance.

Adam Dunhill

Founder – YesData

Adam Dunhill is the founder of YesData - a CRM cleaning and prospect intelligence tool. Prior to YesData, he was the owner of Hugo Dunhill Marketing which was recently acquired by Vin Gupta (DatabaseUSA).

Rick Carlson

President/Founder – SharpSpring

Rick started SharpSpring with the goal of bringing marketing analytics and automation tools to small and medium businesses on an affordable and easy-to-use SaaS platform

[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_col-lg-5 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-xs-12″ css=”.vc_custom_1514478302754{margin-top: 0px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;}”][vc_column_text]

Watch it now

Do you work at a marketing agency?*
yesno

Sign up for a live demo of SharpSpring?*
YesNo

We’re committed to keeping your info safe. Privacy Policy


[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row_content_no_spaces” css=”.vc_custom_1504794984035{padding-top: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_column]

Month-to-month options. No long-term contract required.

START HERE
[/vc_column][/vc_row]
